features.title: Creates a Secrets Manager instance.
features.description: Creates an IBM Secrets Manager instance.

features.title: Sets up authorization policy.
features.description: Sets up IBM IAM authorization policy between IBM Secrets Manager instance and IBM Key Management Service (KMS) instance. It also supports Event Notification authorization policy.

features.title: Configures lifecycle notifications for the Secrets Manager instance.
features.description: Configures lifecycle notifications for the IBM Secrets Manager instance by connecting an IBM Event Notifications service. The DA supports optionally creating a KMS key ring and key, or using an already existing one to encrypt data.
